title: Sage 50 Payroll for Beginners
headline: This free online course covers the simple process for using Sage 50 to manage payroll and organise workplace pensions.
description: Many businesses still struggle with managing payroll manually, which is associated with payment errors and consumes plenty of time. In this course, you will learn a practical step-by-step process for using the Sage payroll management system to accurately remunerate individuals on time, securely store employee records and uncover the latest changes in policies and regulations for the smooth running of your business. Sign up today!
courseDescription:
Sage 50 is an effective and efficient tool for managing your payroll by reducing significant time spent on paperwork and the risk of errors. This course will provide you with practical and expert information you need right at your fingertips to aid in controlling your payroll processes, easily manage your pension schemes and automatically calculate employee payments and deductions accurately.

You will learn how to quickly and easily set up your payroll software and store employee records securely. Familiarise yourself with the processes involved in analysing your payroll data, generating payslips and payment summaries and saving your favourite reports for easy access. You will also learn how to send your submissions to Her Majestyâ€™s Revenue and Customs (HMRC online), track your form status and backup and restore your payment data effortlessly.

Finally, you will acquire the skill to process weekly or monthly payroll efficiently, access historical reports and calculate statutory sick pay, maternity and pensions. Whether you have a running business or are planning to start a new one, you will benefit from mastering the Sage Payroll functionalities to manage and improve your business processes. Why wait? Enrol today!
